verses.name: Matthew 1:14
verses.text: And Azor begat Sadoc; and Sadoc begat Achim; and Achim begat Eliud;

verses.name: Matthew 1:15
verses.text: And Eliud begat Eleazar; and Eleazar begat Matthan; and Matthan begat Jacob;

verses.name: Matthew 1:16
verses.text: And Jacob begat Joseph the husband of Mary, of whom was born Jesus, who is called Christ.

verses.name: Matthew 1:17
verses.text: So all the generations from Abraham to David are fourteen generations; and from David until the carrying away into Babylon are fourteen generations; and from the carrying away into Babylon unto Christ are fourteen generations.
